actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide a limited exclusion of capital gains realized by taxpayers other than corporations with respect to securities purchased after the date of enactment.

summary.text: Small Investor Act - Excludes from gross income, pursuant to the Internal Revenue Code, the first $1,000 of net long-term capital gains over short-term capital losses of noncorporate taxpayers resulting from the sale or exchange of securities.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide a limited exclusion of capital gains realized by taxpayers other than corporations with respect to securities purchased after the date of enactment.
